Sorry, I meant to say "build a RESTful Web Services on
top of SOAP".

Hao

--- softtouchit <softtouchit@...> wrote:
> Dear All,
> 
> Everyone is taking the document centric approach,
> even for the SOAP
> guys. This appears to be a good step away from "fine
> grained" RPC.
> Some new additions to SOAP 1.2 look like RESTful.
> 
> Questions are:
> 
> 1. Is the new SOAP (1.2) RESTful enough that one can
> build a REST Web
> Services?
> 2. Has anyone actually implemeted a RESTful Web
> Services? 
> 
> Hao
> 
>
